Name: Zoning, 5502 Flatlands Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 250122 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 250122 ZRK (5502 Flatlands Avenue Rezoning) submitted by 5502 Flat LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 18, Council District 46.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
